original: aushn'i sha bi dza ya s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aushn'i sha bi dza ya s'a dha nam /

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs //
translated: gTsug tor rnam par rgyal ma’i sgrub thabs

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: 'der sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um yig dkar po las skyes pa'i sku mdog dkar mo //🔽zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: 'der sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um yig dkar po las skyes pa'i sku mdog dkar mo // zhal gsum pa /
translated: Here, one should imagine the Blessed Lady, white in color, born from the syllable bhrūṃ on a moon, in accordance with the rite taught previously.🔽She has three faces.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: phyag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsam par bya'o //
translated: She is endowed with eight arms.

original: ser pa dang nag po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: ser pa dang nag po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
translated: The right and left faces are yellow and black.

original: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs rdo rje dang / padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs rdo rje dang / padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: In her four right hands are a crossed vajra, a buddha seated on a lotus, an arrow, and the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang bum pa gang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang bum pa gang ba'o //
translated: In the four left hands, a bow, a lasso with a threatening forefinger, the boon-granting gesture, and a full vase.

original: mchod rten gyi @215b phug gi nang du bzhugs pa //
analyzed: mchod rten gyi @215b phug gi nang du bzhugs pa //
translated: He is seated inside a stupa.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bskyed nas rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bskyed nas rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsam par bya'o //
translated: Visualize his seed syllable on a lotus at your heart, crowned by Vairocana.

original: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du aom h'um tr'm hr'i:aam aa:zhes pa'i yi ge rnams blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du aom h'um tr'm hr'i:aam aa:zhes pa'i yi ge rnams blta bar bya'o //
translated: After that, visualize the syllables oṃ, hūṃ, traṃ, hrīḥ, aṃ, and aḥ on the crown, forehead, throat, heart, and feet, respectively.

original: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Uṣṇīṣavijayā is complete.
